{"step_by_step_thinking": "Peanut allergy is a type of food allergy to peanuts. It is different from tree nut allergies, with peanuts being legumes, in the same family as peas and lentils. Currently, there is no vaccine available to prevent or cure peanut allergies. The main treatment is to avoid peanuts and be prepared to manage an allergic reaction.", "answer_choice": "B"}
